title: Yabla Review: Are language video wrappers redundant?

media:group.media:title: Yabla Review: Are language video wrappers redundant?
media:group.media:description:
Read my detailed review here: https://www.mezzoguild.com/yabla/
See Yabla here: https://www.mezzoguild.com/goto/yabla-italian
FluentU: https://www.mezzoguild.com/goto/fluentu
I recently put together a Yabla review as I've been exploring 'video wrapper' platforms lately.
How do they remain viable with the millions of freely available videos on YouTube?
Also, how do they manage to get a license to source other people's YouTube content and sell it?
What makes platforms like Yabla useful? (quantity of videos or lesson depth?)

Let me know your thoughts in the comment section.
